txt.en: 'Where are those simpletons? The other sellers have disappeared, surely to go off and enjoy the Faire. I will have their hides if they dare to show their faces after all these hours!\n\n'I'm short of hands, [placeholder], as you can surely see. Would you be so kind as to help me? There are many orders to be filled.'
'Please, don't waste any more time! See how the patrons clamour for our attention? Talk to them, not me!'

Many of the vendors have not returned from their break yet, and the market is crowded with impatient customers awaiting their goods.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Help as many customers as you can during your shift
Customers of the Farmers Market are lining up at the vendor stall.\n\nYou should help fill as many orders as you can before your shift is over.
